# Brown Bag Lunch baggers JSON migration tool

JSON format has changed, but HR file (`baggers-rh.js`) did not.

Let's change that.



### Build + Run

```bash
# Make sure you have git and GNU grep/cut/sed installed

$ git clone git@github.com:Nilhcem/bblfr_data_migration.git
$ cd bblfr_data_migration
$ ./scripts/run.sh

# Generated file will be in bblfr_output directory
```
